title: Rights of the child
text:
United Nations 
A/C.3/80/L.64 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
14 November 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-18550 (E)    171125     
*2518550* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Third Committee 
Agenda item 67 
Promotion and protection of the rights of children 
 
 
 
 
 
Burundi: amendment to revised draft resolution A/C.3/80/L.20/Rev.1 
 
 
 
 Rights of the child 
 
 
1. 
In operative paragraph 13, delete “sexual and reproductive health,”. 
2. 
In operative paragraphs 27 and 43, delete “sexual and reproductive”. 
3. 
In operative paragraph 46, delete “including sexual and reproductive health,”.

paragraphs.1: In operative paragraph 13, delete “sexual and reproductive health,”.
paragraphs.2: In operative paragraphs 27 and 43, delete “sexual and reproductive”.
paragraphs.3: In operative paragraph 46, delete “including sexual and reproductive health,”.
